headline:
VIDEO 2 MINUTES 2 SECONDS
BBC journalist ducks as explosions rock Kyiv
category: Hugo Bachega delivers a news report as several explosions happen in the centre of Kyiv.

headline: Shock and horror as playgrounds and bridges hit
category: Russia's latest attacks have left shell-shocked residents and fiery debris, says Paul Adams in Kyiv.
author: By Paul Adams

headline: Mahsa Amini's family receiving death threats
category: Iran is pressing relatives not to speak out, a cousin says, as protests sparked by her death continue.
author: By Anna Foster

headline: Elon Musk wades into China and Taiwan tensions
category: The billionaire wins China's praise for comments but Taipei says freedom is "not for sale".
author: By Annabelle Liang

headline: Kanye West's social media accounts locked
category: The rapper posted anti-Semitic messages over the weekend, leading to his accounts being suspended.
author: By Mark Savage

headline: Irish village 'never the same again' after explosion
category: A close-knit County Donegal community is coming to terms with the loss of 10 people in an explosion.

headline: N Korea missile launches were 'nuclear attack drills'
category: Pyongyang made its claim as intelligence suggests it is preparing to hold a nuclear weapons test.
author: By Frances Mao

headline: CNN apologises for entering Thai attack site
category: The news organisation had aired footage from inside the building where 23 children were killed.
author: By Yvette Tan

headline: UK brings forward debt plan to calm markets
category: The chancellor will give details on plans to balance government finances nearly a month early.
author: By Daniel Thomas

headline: Dozens killed as landslides sweep though Venezuela
category: At least 25 people have died and 52 are missing as torrential rain hits the Latin American country.
author: By Malu Cursino & Vanessa Buschschlüter

headline: UK brings forward debt plan to calm markets
category: The chancellor will give details on plans to balance government finances nearly a month early.
author: By Daniel Thomas

headline: Dozens killed as landslides sweep though Venezuela
category: At least 25 people have died and 52 are missing as torrential rain hits the Latin American country.
author: By Malu Cursino & Vanessa Buschschlüter

headline: Nurse poisoned babies with insulin, trial told
category: Lucy Letby is described as a "constant malevolent presence" at the opening of her murder trial.

headline: At least 76 killed in Nigeria boat accident
category: President Muhammadu Buhari ordered a review of safety measures in the country's water systems.
author: By Ishaq Khalid

headline: Harvey Weinstein to go on trial in Los Angeles
category: The former movie producer, serving 23 years in jail in New York, faces 11 further charges of abuse.
author: By Paul Glynn
